data.name: Bless Online: Mysterious Masquerade Pack - New year's Edition
data.detailed_description:
This DLC contains the Bless Online: Mysterious Masquerade Pack - New year Edition. This pack includes a character cosmetic item and useful in-game items.

The Bless Online: Mysterious Masquerade Pack - New year Edition can be downloaded only once per account. As all components are character bound, so please collect the DLC only with the character you wish to use it on.

Bless Online: Mysterious Masquerade Pack - New year Edition Includes the following:

  • Hat (Deep Black Masquerade Face Decoration)
    Give your character a sense of mystery with the Deep Black Masquerade Mask!

  • Ruru Brother's Magic Pocket (x 5)
    Gather resources easily with the Ruru Brother's Magic Pocket!

  • Popochita Rare Mount Anima (x 5)
    Discover more new companions with the Popochita Rare Mount Anima!

  • Growth Potion (1 Hour) (x 5)
    Level up faster with the Growth Potion!

To activate purchased DLC products in-game, please follow the steps below.
  • Purchase DLC product.
  • Log-on to Bless and open your account inbox.
  • Items will be automatically sent to your character’s mailbox.
    Once you collect the items from your mailbox, the item will automatically be added to the inventory of the character you used to accept the item


Note:
- The items will be sent individually to the account inbox. Please collect each item with the correct character.
- Please note that once the item has been collected to the character’s inventory, it cannot be transferred to another character.

data.short_description: This DLC contains the Bless Online: Mysterious Masquerade Pack. This pack includes a character cosmetic item and useful in-game items.
data.supported_languages:
English*, German, Korean
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64bit) *Bless Online cannot be played on 32bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4670 / AMD FX8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX760 / AMD Radeon HD7870
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 55 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit) *Bless Online cannot be played on 32bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 7700 / AMD RYZEN 7 1700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Storage: 55 GB available space
